dict.string:
Adverse effects on psychological
or physical function is due to not
having breakfast occurred when the
person was used to having breakfast

If, after missing breakfast,
a person gets hungry later in the
morning, it is likely that they will
eat less nutritionally sound foods
and this can lead to poor eating habits.

To help regulate appetite it is
a useful idea to have a variety of
interesting, low energy-dense (low
kilojoule) snacks available before
and after the evening
meal to nibble on.

Exercise before or after the evening
meal can also help regulate appetite.
Large meals in the evening may make
it harder for some people
to sleep well.
